storyInfo: A strange, supernatural incident takes place at Emperor's bar, with unusual noises coming from the walls. Xiaohei arrives to investigate, only to find a small animal in the air ducts.

attributes.content: The frost-like moonlight shines down on the paulownia table in the middle of the hall. Sitting at it are a husband and wife. The wife rubs her hands as though she has something to say, while her husband props his head up with his hands, attempting to catch a nap.
She swallows her saliva and begins to speak hesitantly.
Dear, I heard a strange sound in the kitchen today... It sounded like... da-da-dah. It was so frightening.
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: So? Is it worth making a fuss over? All houses creak like that to no end when they get on in years. We just moved in. You'll get used to it.
attributes.name: Husband

attributes.content: No, I don't mean creaking. I-It sounded like there was something inside the wall.
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: Damn it, woman. Stop wasting time listening to the walls and do some housework for once! I go out. I work my butt off to make a living. All I want is to come home to a nice, hot meal on the table, but, instead, I get nothing.
attributes.name: Husband

attributes.content: I-I couldn't... I felt a chill down my spine whenever I stepped into the kitchen. It was like... there was something looking at me.
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: Enough quibbling! You just want to slack off, don't you?! Maybe a good beating'll teach you how to get your work done!
attributes.name: Husband

attributes.content: I-I'm sorry, please! I still haven't healed up from last time!
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: Then get your big butt back in the kitchen and get me a warm bottle of booze! And fry up some peanuts, while you're at it.
attributes.name: Husband

attributes.content: No, please, I'm scared to go in the kitchen!
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: Then it sounds like you ain't been hit enough!
attributes.name: Husband

attributes.content: Please, forgive me! Have mercy!
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: Let's see how you feel after I—
attributes.name: Husband

attributes.content: Listen! It's that noise again!
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: Da-da-da.
I'm not lying! That's the noise!
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: Da-da-da.
Fine. I'll go and see what's up. But if I don't find anything, you better be ready for a whopping.
attributes.name: Husband

attributes.content: I, I—
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: Dark rainclouds shroud the moon outside the window. A storm is brewing.
Dear? Dear?
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: Do you see anything?
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: The wife waits for a long time and hears nothing. Only a barely audible noise can be heard from the kitchen.
She holds her breath and stands up to listen more closely. All she can hear is the sound:
Da-da-da.
The wife's expression changes immediately and her pupils dilate. Cold sweat drips from her forehead, and just as she is about to run to her neighbor for help, her husband speaks.
Come here.
attributes.name: Husband

attributes.content: Dear, are you okay?
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: It's all okay now.
attributes.name: Husband

attributes.content: The wife picks up a candle and inches towards the kitchen before nudging open the slightly-open door. Inside is pitch black; barely anything is visible.
She holds up the candle to find her husband leaning against the wall. She breathes a sigh of relief.
Did you find anything?
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: Come here. It's all okay now.
attributes.name: Husband

attributes.content: Dear, you already said that. Why say it again?
attributes.name: Wife

attributes.content: Come here. It's all okay now.
attributes.name: Husband

attributes.content: The dim, yellow candlelight flickers in front of her husband's face. She suddenly notices that he's been completely expressionless ever since she entered the kitchen, repeating the same phrase again and again.
Come here. It's all okay now.
A bolt of lightning strikes outside the window, briefly lighting up the entire room.
That's when she realizes that her husband isn't leaning against the wall. Rather, his entire body has fused into the wall, with only his pale face still visible.
At the same time, a familiar noise can be heard once more.
Da-da-da.
At last, she cannot contain herself anymore and starts screaming.
Aaaaagh—Stop it!
Aaaahh! Croissant, stop! I-I don't want to listen anymore, *whimpers*.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Heh, I ain't done yet. Y'all wanna know what happens to the wife, don'tcha?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: (Covers her ears) No no no no I don't wanna know!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Hahaha, then how 'bout you, kiddo? Wanna hear the rest?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Go on. I'm listening.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Look at ya tryna stay all calm. Stop pretendin'. I know a scaredy-cat when I see one.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: But... It really wasn't that scary.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Heh, drop the tough act. If yer really scared though, I can give ya a big ole hug to calm ya down.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Thanks, but I think she needs it more than me.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Turns around)
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: (Sobs)
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: That was so scary... *sobs*... Why'd you have to tell us such a scary story? You're such a meanie!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Urgh... Sorry. Haha... I was just tryna give the kid a spook. Sure didn't expect to hit a full grown girl in the crossfire.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: *Whimpers*... Are you saying I'm more of a scaredy pants than a kid?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Naw, that ain't... Eh, my bad. Just stop cryin', alright?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Anyhow, kiddo. Ya really weren't scared? Fer real?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Not a bit.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Damn, ice cold.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Don't care how it ends, then?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: The wife-beater got his punishment. That's good enough for me.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: True 'nuff, bet she's gonna way happier without that asshole.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Then I guess ya ain't scared of spirits bitin' off yer toes, either! Rawr!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: (But... I'm a spirit too.)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Actually, I see this sort of thing happen all the time...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: What?! Don't tell me it's... a true story?!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Gee, thanks Croissant, now I'll never get a good night's sleep ever again...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Hell naw, I pulled that straight outta my— Hey, you alright, Sora? Snap out of it. Hey!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Um...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (What do I tell them? Where I'm from, this kind of thing can usually be blamed on people with spatial powers...)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (I feel like just about everyone at the Hall for Spirits is already used to it, though.)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I asked you two to fetch me Lee's boys, so how come it's been half a day and ya'll are chilling out here? What, you two really so lost without my guidance?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Sorry, Baws. We waited half an hour, and we ain't seen any of Mr. Lee's folks, only this little boy. So we've been havin' ourselves the most boring thirty minutes.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: The most terrifying thirty minutes...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Excuse me, are you Mr. Emperor?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: The one and only.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Mr. Lee sent me to take care of the strange sounds in your shop. My name is Xiaohei.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Haha... Surprise, Baws!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I hope those past thirty minutes have been REAL boring, 'cause this is gonna be the least boring-ass weekend you'll ever have.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Really understatin' overtime there, Baws...
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: (Why didn'tcha say so sooner, kiddo?!)
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: (You never gave me a chance before you jumped into that ghost story.)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Uh... Well...
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Has Old Lee filled you in on the details?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Only the gist.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Fei-zai, bring the boy up to speed on what you saw.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Starting about three months ago, I've been hearing some weird tapping sounds. Like, 'da-da-da,' on-and-off in the kitchen and the storeroom. It's especially noticeable at night when it's all quiet outside.
attributes.name: Barkeep

attributes.content: We've also had some smaller food items go missing from both places, so I'm guessing there's some kinda small animal hiding inside the walls. And, most importantly—
attributes.name: Barkeep

attributes.content: Most importantly, that damn pest has gone and chewed up my limited edition vinyl! Ain't nobody walking outta my bar alive after hurting my babies.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: (So this is where you got the story, Croissant?)
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: (Haha, I've been learnin' from the baws how to draw inspiration from everything...)
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Why not call a professional exterminator then?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I did, but those morons had the balls to tell me they'd have to tear down the whole damn wall to find whatever it is.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: And there ain't no place in Lungmen with more character than this bar here. Only a philistine would even think of laying a finger on it.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: (The entire place is decked out in gold... Laojun's hideout was prettier.)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Lee said you'd have a better idea. Now don't you disappoint me, or you'll have hell to pay.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Hmph—
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (I wouldn't have come if I hadn't promised Mr. Lee.)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I gave Mr. Lee my word, so you can bet your butt I'll get the job done.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Then show me what you've got, kid.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: (Reaches flipper out to pat Xiaohei's head)
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Don't touch my ears, thank you very much.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Whoa, that's somethin'. Kid's brave enough to lock horns with the baws.)
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: (He'll remember him for this... Oh, I'm so worried.)
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: (What a funny kid. Might be fun to keep him around to tease. I gotta come up with an excuse to nab him from Lee.)
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: No one's following...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Perfect.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Where are the air ducts...? Oh, there we go. Up there.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Heixiu, I'm counting on you.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Climbs into the air ducts)
attributes.name: Heixiu

attributes.content: There you are.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: You burrowed yourself pretty deep inside.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: You don't wanna come out on your own? Guess I'll have to come get you then, huh?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: In the blink of an eye, the metal ring hidden up Xiaohei's sleeve slides out on its own and makes a few loops in the air before transforming into a number of balls of different sizes.

Xiaohei points at the entrance of the air duct, and the steel balls rush into the vent one after another. The sharp sound of their bouncing chases the unknown creature inside to a vent on the other end.
On hearing the rattling 'da-da-da' sound, Xiaohei removes the vent's cover and finds a small animal all curled up and trembling.
*Chirp*.
It's okay now. Come here.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Sorry, I wasn't trying to scare you.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Cautiously climbs onto Xiaohei's palm)
You're even tinier than Biu.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: *Chirp*...
You need to find somewhere else to live. The people here don't want you here anymore.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: *Chirp*?
If you stay, you'll be in danger.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: That weird penguin said you chewed up his things and he's gonna show you what for.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: *Chirp*!
Don't worry, I won't hand you over to him.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Off you go now. I'm gonna let you go.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: This is the bar's backdoor. Get going.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: *Chirp*.
No need to thank me. See ya.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: What are you doing back here?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Is that... something in your mouth?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: *Whine*...
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Spit it out!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Open wide! Stop biting! It's going to die.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: *Spit*.
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: *Chirp*...
(Falls onto the ground)
Is it hurt from the bite?!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Tries to get up and run)
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Don't you run! Get back here!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Sprints away)
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Careful!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Thump—
Mew...
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: (Falls onto the ground)
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: *Creak*—
Crap!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: The shelf that the storm cloudbeast slammed into starts to tumble over. With no time to worry about the wares on it, Xiaohei dashes forward to grab the two animals before it falls on them.
By the time he regains his footing, the shelf behind him has collapsed with a loud crash.
The heck's goin' on in here?!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Ahh! That's the crate of booze the boss bought just the other day!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Mind explaining what going on, boy?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: (Lifts the small animal up with his left hand)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I found this critter inside the wall!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: As for the shelf...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Lifts the storm cloudbeast with his right hand)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: This guy knocked it over!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Mew...?
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Oh, you're finally awake.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Mew...
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: You're getting me in big trouble. What'd you follow me for?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Droops its head)
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: I told you. I'll help you out, but I'm busy today.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Lies down)
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Whatever... Blaming you's not going to help right now.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Hey, kiddo? What're ya talkin' to that cloudbeast for? C'mere, I reckon Baws is only 'bout 60% mad. You might still get back in one piece.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Hey, stop scaring him.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I'll find a way to pay for the things that got damaged.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Hmph, that's the finest vintage rum brewed from Bolívar's sweetest sugar cane that year.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: But my spiritual needs come first. I'll deal with your punk ass later. First, I'mma take a good look at the vermin that chewed up my vinyls.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: What'd you guys do with it...?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Fei-zai, bring me the cage!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Coming up, Boss.
attributes.name: Barkeep

attributes.content: *Chirp*!
Ah, so it was a musbeast.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: It looks so cute!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: What's a musbeast?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: They're critters that live in the Sargonian wilderness. Travelin' merchants sometimes bring 'em to nomadic cities to sell as pets. On account of how cute they are.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: But if it's a pet, what's it doing in an air duct?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Well, they're nocturnal. Also pretty skittish and they don't warm up to folks easy. Some like to throw 'em out 'cause they don't like how rowdy the little fellas get at night, or maybe they're just plain sick of takin' care of 'em.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Air ducts are hidden and cool, just like the caves they're s'posed to live in. So you sometimes find 'em makin' themselves at home and startin' a litter.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Shouldn't the owners be punished for being so irresponsible?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Hah, Lungmen ain't got no laws like that. Even if we did, enforcing 'em is a whole 'nother story.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: You're too kind, Sora. You can't even imagine how much damage these musbeasts do to the city's infrastructure.
attributes.name: Barkeep

attributes.content: Their teeth grow so fast that they've got to wear them down every day, so they chew on anything they come across.
attributes.name: Barkeep

attributes.content: You know the blackout in District 13 last year? That happened because a pack of musbeasts chewed up an underground power line.
attributes.name: Barkeep

attributes.content: As I 'member it, the city wasted a whole lotta money last year tryna exterminate 'em.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: (Frowns) But... they came here against their will.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: And we spent all that tax money against our will too. What're you gonna do?
attributes.name: Barkeep

attributes.content: Can't they catch them and release them back into the wild?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: (Shakes head) And throw good money after bad? 'Sides, are there even any good habitats near Lungmen's route? Heck, they might end up causin' even more damage to the environment.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: If they're pets, then there's got to be a demand for adopting them, right? How about we put up some notices in front of the shop and look for a new owner?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: That might've worked a few years back, but these days you hear nothing but bad news about them. I hear they're even about to put out new regulations against keeping them. Who'd come looking for trouble?
attributes.name: Barkeep

attributes.content: Hmph, if you're so smart, then let's hear your idea!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Eh... Just find a barrel and drown it. That's how I used to deal with pests back home.
attributes.name: Barkeep

attributes.content: (Grits teeth) What gives you the right to do that?!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Hah, I've met plenty of kids like you. You feel bad for them because they're cute. You wouldn't even be complaining if they were ugly.
attributes.name: Barkeep

attributes.content: That's not true!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: What're you glaring at me for? We found it in our store, so we get to decide what to do with it.
attributes.name: Barkeep

attributes.content: It's not like they wanted to be here. It was you people who brought them here and abandoned them. How is any of this their fault?!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: What's your point? Survival of the fittest, kid. We humans are on top of the food chain, so of course we get to decide what to do with them!
attributes.name: Barkeep

attributes.content: I've heard enough!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I could tell you the same, punk! Stay out of this!
attributes.name: Barkeep

attributes.content: Alright! You bitches are giving me tinnitus!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Shut up, all of you. I've made my decision.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Emperor cocks his gun and points it straight at the musbeast inside the cage. Faced with its imminent bloody demise, everyone's breathing quickens.
But just before he is able to pull the trigger, a small hand grabs the barrel.
You can't kill it.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: You think your punk ass can stop me, kid? Maybe you've got skills, but have you thought about the consequences?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: You're here as Lee's errand boy. You don't want his street cred to go down the drain 'cause of you, do you?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I'm just...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Is this really the only way?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: They were forced to leave their homes and roam the streets... Nobody wants that.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Can't we come up with something else?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: No one lets them stay anywhere... It's got to be painful...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: All they want is a place to live!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: You done?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: (Raises handgun)
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Boss, I can take care of—
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Shush.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I can bring it back with me! Don't you dare kill it!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: What're y'all so tense for? I'm just lighting a cigar.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: That's... a lighter?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: What else would it be? Etched ammo's mad steep. Why'd I waste any here?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: You really meant all that, though? Not bad. Touching, even.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: (Blushes)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Hmph, punks like you are cuter when you show your feelings. What's so fun about wearing a poker face all day?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: So, Boss, about the musbeast...
attributes.name: Barkeep

attributes.content: Keep it. I'll adopt it.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: So... you were never gonna kill it?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Nonsense. You think you got what it takes to know the mind of a king?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: (Who the hell would know how you think?!)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: But the government is about to—
attributes.name: Barkeep

attributes.content: Do I look like I'm scared of that biznatch Wei Yenwu?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Fine, you're the boss, Boss.
attributes.name: Barkeep

attributes.content: Hey, kid, stop standing around. Grab that cage and come with me.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Where? For what?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Just shut up and follow.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Heh, that's 'bout what I figured'd happen!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: So you stopped me because you knew he wasn't going to kill it?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Who do ya think sold him that gun? Er, lighter?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: So you let me and the boy worry ourselves to death over nothing?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: C'mon, like you didn't wanna see his poker face crumble too?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: You're such a meanie!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: What happened in the store just now? Why does Fei-zai looks so pissed?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Haha, he got embarrassed by the baws and a kid.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Right, we found the critter in the wall. A musbeast.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Figures. So how'd the Boss deal with it?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Fei-zai said we should get rid of it, but he decided to adopt it as his pet.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: A musbeast... Not too surprising.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Eh, you know somethin'?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: He used to keep another small critter, too. A couple years ago, maybe...?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: How come we never heard about this?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Because... he's shy?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: So? What happened?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: What happened? Musbeasts have an average lifespan of two years. It died.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: So that's why he's always gettin' hammered and listenin' to blues in his room 'round then?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Probably.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Oh no... I think I'm starting to tear up again.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Hey, stop!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: So, you've been keeping quiet the whole time. Got nothin' to say to me?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Thank you, Mr. Emperor.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Like I care about your thanks, punk. That's not what I want from you.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Then I've got nothing else to say.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: That's really all that you're bottling up?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Uhh...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Why did you decide to keep it? Does it just... happen to suit to your fancy?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Why else?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: So if you didn't like it, you'd have listened to the other guy? Would you have killed it?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: If I did, what would you do?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: I'd have stopped you.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Then good.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: ...What do you mean?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: If my decision wasn't gonna affect yours, what's the problem?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: But—
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: If you've made up your mind, stop yammering and follow through with it. You better think it through first, though. Else you might regret it your whole life.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Alright, we're here.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: This place is...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: You know it?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Yeah, Mr. Lee told me about the slums before. It's where the people with the Stone Disease live.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: What else did he tell you?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: That I should stay away.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: He's right. This ain't a place for brats like you to be hanging out in.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Then why'd you bring me here...?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Because ain't nobody wants to come here, which makes it a perfect hideout for anyone who doesn't wanna be found.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Hey, Mr. Emperor. What brings you here today?
I've got two critters I need you to take a look at.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: What strange animals have you brought me today?
Show him, punk.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Here.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: A musbeast? Oh, and a storm cloudbeast too.
Mr. Emperor, who's this?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: A doctor. He's got mad skills. Knows how to treat both people and animals.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Haha, I can deal with just about anyone or anything. As long as they're not scared to visit me, that is.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: If he's so amazing, why hide here?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Ask him, not me.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Eh, because I'm a criminal.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: How could a doctor be a criminal?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Because a doctor will always force you to face your pains in the most direct and cruelest way possible. They bring nothing but bad news.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: That just makes you honest, not a criminal.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Haha, the most honest people are also the cruellest.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: So what are you getting at?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Very good. Stay suspicious. Don't take everything at face value.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: It's the things you're most sure of that will always betray you in the end.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Have you tried not speaking in riddles?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: You done yet? So what's going on with the musbeast?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Forget I said all that. Oww...
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Here, sweetie, let me take a look... It doesn't look so bad. It's pretty thin, and its fur lacks luster, so it's just malnourished. Looks kind of out of it, though. Did something happen?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Is it sick?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Maybe it's scared? It was in the storm cloudbeast's mouth not too long ago.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Licks claws) Ao...
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: No wonder. Small critters like this happen to be a cloudbeasts' favorite meal.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: This one really seems familiar, though... It's like I've seen it before...
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: (Picks up the storm cloudbeast)
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Good boy, let me take a look. Ah, I knew it. I stitched this leg wound up myself. It's neat, elegant, and just perfect.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Do you remember its master?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Hm, they brought this little fella to me three years ago. If memory serves, they had Oripathy. By the looks of it, they were on their last legs.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: I felt sorry, so I patched the cloudbeast up for free, but then they asked me to keep the little guy too.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: And you didn't.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Of course not. I'm a doctor, not a philanthropist.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Not 'cause your broke ass couldn't afford it?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: See? What did I just say? The most honest people are also the most cruel.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Uh... I guess?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: So... Do you know where that person is now?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: They was very sick, so probably dead by now? There's an empty lot on the outskirts of the slums, where people sometimes put up whatever an Infected's left behind, to remember them by. You could try checking there.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Come to think of it, I still remember them turning out their pockets to find every last bit of change, just so I would adopt it. Poor thing.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: You still remember after so long?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Well... I have a good memory. It's strange, isn't it? I even remember how much they managed to scrape together.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: How much?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Sixty-seven. Sixty-seven LMD exact.
attributes.name: Doc
